name: meview
description: Image/Video viewer for typical web media formats. Also supports zip-archives.

scripts.babel: npm run clean && babel -d app/js/ app/src/
scripts.babel:w: npm run clean && babel -w -d app/js/ app/src/
scripts.build:win: npm run babel && npm run clean:dist && build -w
scripts.build:mac: npm run babel && npm run clean:dist && build -m
scripts.build:linux: npm run babel && npm run clean:dist && build -l
scripts.debugbuild:win: npm run clean && npm run clean:dist && npm run babel && build -w --dir
